QueryResult.text: select odf_ca_clr_vs_agreement.id object_instance_id, a.user_id from cmn_sec_chk_user_v0 a, odf_ca_clr_vs_agreement where a.object_id = 5023221 and a.permission_code = 'READ' and a.object_instance_id = odf_ca_clr_vs_agreement.id UNION select odf_ca_clr_vs_agreement.id object_instance_id, a.user_id from cmn_sec_chk_user_v0 a, odf_ca_clr_vs_agreement where a.object_id in (select so.id from odf_object_extensions oe, odf_objects o, cmn_sec_objects so where o.code = oe.object_code and oe.extension_code = 'inv' and so.object_type_code = 'RECORD' and so.object_code = o.right_code) and a.permission_code = 'READ' and a.object_instance_id = odf_ca_clr_vs_agreement.odf_parent_id
